title: Purgatory
description: Darren Colt and Agatha Kaine are partners, fighting the supernatural and sending monsters, demons, and gods back where they came from.
quote: He’s trying to seduce you. He’s an incubus clone!
creator: Lance Dorado
altHero: Hades, a fedora-wearing bro with glowing red eyes, holds up three fingers
alt2: a gloved hand examines a woman’s corpse
alt3: Agatha Kaine holds up a gun
alt4: two Darren Colts both hold up their hands as if innocent
